articles.title: Europe headed for mini-ice age as AMOC tipping point approaches – paper - bne IntelliNews
articles.description: A recent study finds that the AMOC (Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation) is on course to stop flowing, at the latest, within the next 75 ...
articles.content: A recent study finds that the AMOC (Atlantic Meridional Overturning Circulation) is on course to stop flowing, at the latest, within the next 75 years, causing a mini-ice age in Europe and could disr… [+5953 chars]
